title: Rounded, modern ITC Machine?
content:
Outdoor advertisment for a McDonalds product.  
Tried to id on myfonts with no luck.

Any guesses?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/waffle_5730.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013200649im_/http:/typophile.com/files/waffle%20copy_3619.jpg)
author: notcarl

comments.content: The rounding looks like the result of an applied stroke, so the typeface you're looking for is probably considerably lighter than this one…
